member.name: TCP_ESTATS_PATH_RW_v0
member.summary: The TCP_ESTATS_PATH_RW_v0 structure contains read/write configuration information for extended TCP statistics on path measurement for a TCP connection.

summary.para: A value that indicates if extended statistics on a TCP connection should be collected for path measurement information.
If this member is set to TRUE, extended statistics on the TCP connection are enabled. If this member is set to FALSE, extended statistics on the TCP connection are disabled.
The default state for this member when not set is disabled.
